doc:
Matt Gerald https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matt_Gerald 0 Matt Gerald is an American actor and screenwriter, known for his roles in numerous films and television projects. He currently portrays Melvin Potter in the Marvel Netflix series Daredevil, as part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Gerald was born in Miami, Florida. A graduate of The University of Pennsylvania, he is best known for his roles as Melvin Potter on Netflix's Daredevil, Corporal Lyle Wainfleet in James Cameron's sci-fi thriller Avatar, and elusive predator, Ray Speltzer, on Showtime's Dexter. Matt_Gerald is an_American_actor_and_screenwriter , known for his_roles in numerous_films_and_television_projects . He currently portrays Melvin_Potter in the_Marvel_Netflix_series_Daredevil , as part of the_Marvel_Cinematic_Universe . Gerald was_born in Miami , Florida . A_graduate of The_University of Pennsylvania , he is_best_known for his_roles as Melvin_Potter on Netflix 's_Daredevil , Corporal_Lyle_Wainfleet in James_Cameron 's_sci-fi_thriller_Avatar , and elusive_predator , Ray_Speltzer , on Showtime 's_Dexter .
